articles.author: Leonie Cater
articles.title: Sunak, Starmer slam Farage claim that EU, NATO 'provoked' invasion of Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We have provoked this war,” the Reform UK leader said Friday evening.
articles.content:
Starmer told reporters Farages comments were disgraceful, adding that Russia alone is responsible for the invasion of Ukraine.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: France, China launch satellite in attempt to explore the universe - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: China’s advances in space exploration are outpacing those of the US and attracting partners from Europe and Asia.
articles.content:
A satellite developed by France and China has blasted off on a hunt for the mightiest explosions in the universe, in a notable example of cooperation between a Western power and the Asian giant.
